We recently added a [non-const Data()](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/650f5e3ca384c26734023f8798e235c758feb762/include/ignition/gazebo/components/Component.hh?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Component.hh-351) function, so I think this could be simplified to something like:

`_ecm.Component<components::AxisAlignedBoundingBox>(_parent->Data())->Data() += boundingBox;`

But you may want to check if `modelBoundingBox` is not null just to be safe, any system can remove any component at any time.

We recently added a non-const Data() function, so I think this could be simplified to something like:

_ecm.Component<components::AxisAlignedBoundingBox>(_parent->Data())->Data() += boundingBox;

But you may want to check if modelBoundingBox is not null just to be safe, any system can remove any component at any time.
